business.headline: Health insurance: 4 tips to reduce premiums for senior citizens Purchasing a health insurance policy at a younger age can help in securing reduced premium rates. Generally, lower insurance premiums are offered to younger people as they are considered low risk.

Index Funds vs. ETFs: 5 key things every investor should know Exchange-Traded Funds are traded like shares on the stock market and can be sold or purchased at existing market prices during the day, while Index Funds are traded only once at the closure of the share market.

ICMAI demands 'accountant' status for cost accountants in new Income Tax BillIn its memorandum, ICMAI highlighted the extensive training of Cost and Management Accountants (CMAs), which includes expertise in taxation, finance, auditing, corporate laws, and strategic risk management.

New tax regime: 3 deductions that can help taxpayers maximise savings  Though the new regime offered concessional tax rates, it reduced several popular deductions and exemptions, like HRA, LTA, interest on home loans, Section 80C, and more.

AI to take centre stage at the 3rd Digital News Publishers Association ConclaveThrough various keynote sessions, panel discussions and expert presentations, this year's DNPA Conclave aims to decode various critical issues, future strategies, opportunities and models that can power an equitable, inclusive and sustainable digital media ecosystem in an era of rapid technological advancement.
AMFI launches Chhoti SIP, Tarun Yojana, and MITRA. All you need to knowThe latest initiative by AMFI reinforces its goal of making mutual fund investments accessible to all investors across India.

Sensex, Nifty end lower for another session; auto stocks tumbleThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 424.90 points to 75,311.06 at the closing bell, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 117.25 points to settle at 22,795.90.

Explained: What are 'high-conviction stocks' and why investors should track themHigh-conviction stocks are shares that investors, analysts, or fund managers strongly believe will deliver higher-than-average returns.

8th Pay Commission: When will it be formed? A look at the past trendsA Pay Commission recommends changes to the salary structure, allowances and benefits to be offered to employees depending upon the prevailing economic structure.

Explained: Why M&M share price tumbled 6% todayThe stock tumbled after the company said it will put money into a rights issue for its two subsidiaries—Mahindra & Mahindra Financial Services (MMFSL) and Mahindra Lifespace Developers (MLDL).

Worried about volatile stock market? Check these 10 potential multibagger stocksThe most important factor for determining multibagger stocks is to check earnings and growth potential. Investors should seek stocks that consistently deliver revenue and profit, check metrics like PE ratio and dividend yield, and compare their performance with sectoral or broader market trends.

Planning to start SIP? 2 reasons why you should consider NPSBy investing in NPS, individuals can claim tax benefits of up to Rs 1.5 lakh under Section 80C and an additional Rs 50,000 under Section 80CCD (1B).

Explained: Why Religare Enterprises share price jumped up to 9% today Soon after the announcement, Religare's stock price climbed 8.52% to hit Rs 242 on the Bombay Stock Exchange. At around 11:24 am, shares of the company were trading 2.31% higher at Rs 228.15.

India may let foreign EV makers like Tesla test market before investing: ReportThe government may let foreign electric vehicle makers like Tesla sell cars first and invest later, with final SMEC guidelines expected soon to kickstart local manufacturing incentives.

Sensex tanks nearly 500 points. 3 reasons why stock market is falling todayThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 461.08 points to 75,274.88 at 11:32 am and the NSE Nifty50 fell 144.45 points to trade at 22,768.70. Here are 3 things investors need to know about today's stock market downturn.

Sensex, Nifty fall as FII selling, Trump's tariff threat batter D-StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 272.61 points to 75,463.64 at around 9:51 am, while the NSE Nifty50 declined 91.80 points to 22,821.35.

PNB revises interest rates. Check new home, car and personal loan rates There will be zero processing fees and documentation charges on most of PNB's home loan schemes till March 31, 2025, thereby making housing loans more affordable and more accessible.
LIC Smart Pension Plan: Check eligibility and other details The Smart Pension Plan requires a minimum investment of Rs 1,00,000, while there is no cap on the maximum purchase limit.

Tesla set for India entry with first EV shipment in coming months: Report The US carmaker plans to start selling these cars in the three major cities of Mumbai, Delhi, and Bangalore around the third quarter of the year, say reports.

Sensex ends 200 points lower, Nifty below 23,000; HDFC falls over 2%Stock market closing today: The S&P BSE Sensex ended 203.22 points lower at 75,735.96, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 19.75 points to settle at 22,913.15.

Will Donald Trump's reciprocal tariffs hurt Indian rupee? It may be noted that India was the 10th biggest exporter to the US in 2024, and higher tariffs might make it tougher for Indian businesses to sell their goods there.

Can employers deny gratuity in any situation? Here's all you need to knowWith the latest ruling, the Supreme Court has stated that if an employer dismisses an employee on grounds of moral turpitude, his gratuity can be forfeited without waiting for a court's verdict.

FIIs continue to dump Indian stocks: Which stocks are feeling the heat? Data from National Securities Depository Limited (NSDL) showed that FPIs have dumped $3.5 billion worth of financial stocks in 2025 so far, accounting for 31% of their total sales of $11.45 billion as of February 14.

RBI may allow some depositors of New India Co-op Bank to withdraw funds: Report Last week, the RBI took strict action against New India Co-operative bank by suspending deposit withdrawals for six months, stopping the issuance of new loans, and appointing an administrator.

Uday Kotak explains how FIIs are gaining at the expense of domestic investorsUday Kotak said that FIIs are benefiting from the investments made by domestic retail investors, who are continuously putting money into the stock market.

Google Pay begins charging for bill payments. Here's what users need to knowThis is not the first time Google Pay has announced the imposition of fees. Last year, it levied Rs 3 convenience fee for mobile recharges.

Indian exporters aren't losing sleep over Donald Trump's tariff threat. Here's whyIndustry executives say US tariff hikes on autos and pharmaceuticals won't hurt Indian exporters much, as competitors from other countries will face the same impact.

Will tax cuts for middle class in budget help boost consumption? RBI says this The RBI bulletin pointed out that the government has given a Rs 1 lakh crore tax break to the middle class, which should leave more money in their pockets.

Dalal Street carnage: Top market investors lose over Rs 80,000 croreThe recent stock market downturn has wiped out over Rs 80,000 crore from the portfolios of some of India's most renowned investors, such as Radhakishan Damani and the Jhunjhunwala family.

EPFO to roll out UPI-based EPF claim withdrawals within 3 months. Check detailsOnce integrated, claim amounts can be easily accessed by the subscribers via digital wallets, mention sources. This would minimise the processing time and lead to an enhanced user-friendly experience.

Is India's economy set for a strong recovery? Here's what RBI saysThe government's push on capital spending, MSMEs, agriculture, and exports is expected to help the economy in the long run while keeping the fiscal deficit in check. A recent repo rate cut might also support domestic demand.

Why shares of cigarette makers ITC, Godfrey Phillips are falling today?ITC's share price was trading 1.44% lower at Rs 400.65 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE) at 11:06 am. Godfrey Phillips shares were down 4.58% to Rs 6,260 and VST Industries stock was down 3% to Rs 290.65.

Why NPS is better than EPF for tax saving under new tax regimeNPS vs EPF: In the case of EPF, employee contributions generally qualify for a deduction under Section 80C of the Income Tax Act, capped at Rs 1.5 lakh annually, under the Old Income Tax regime.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as FMCG, banking stocks drag marketThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 233.22 points to 75,705.96, while the NSE Nifty50 was down by 75.05 points to 22,857.85 as of 9:38 AM.

Cigarette prices set to rise? Government may hike GST on tobacco productsCurrently, cigarettes and other tobacco products attract a GST of 28% along with various other levies, taking the total tax burden to 53%.

Dalal Street's losing streak: Why the market fall may not end soonStock Market: The earnings growth of Nifty50 companies was 5% in the October-December quarter, marking the third straight quarter of single-digit growth, which is a sharp contrast to the double-digit profit growth seen in the previous two years.
Sensex, Nifty end marginally lower in volatile session; small and midcaps gainThe S&P BSE Sensex ended 28.21 points lower at 75,939.18, while the NSE Nifty50 settled 12.40 points lower at 22,932.90.

FIIs continue to dump Indian stocks: What it means for your investment portfolioWith FIIs selling aggressively, smallcaps and midcaps bleeding, and China attracting inflows, here's what retail investors should do.

Tesla likely to set up shop in India, may invest $3-5 billion: Sources During their visit, Tesla executives are expected to hold meetings with officials from the Prime Minister's Office (PMO) and other key ministries.
Small SIP, big returns: Check how Rs 250 a month can grow to Rs 17 lakhSBI Mutual Fund's new JanNivesh SIP is making investing more accessible, letting anyone start with as little as Rs 250 a month.

entertainment.headline: Watch: Honey Singh's take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi Aa Gaya Oye'Honey Singh launched his Millionaire India Tour in Mumbai, delivering a captivating performance that engaged a sold-out audience. He shared his take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi aa gays oye', emphasising unity among diverse Indian communities.

Watch: Honey Singh kicks off Millionaire tour with a grand Mumbai showRapper Honey Singh launched his Millionaire Tour with a spectacular concert in Mumbai. The show featured dramatic entrances and a lineup of energetic performances.

Undercover High School X review: Fans give thumbs up to Seo Kang-joon's K-dramaUndercover High School, featuring Seo Kang-joon and Jin Ki-joo, has premiered on MBC TV. The series, praised for its engaging storyline, follows an undercover NIS agent as a high school student.

Rapper Diddy's attorney withdraws from case: Under no circumstances can I continueAnthony Ricco, representing Sean 'Diddy' Combs, has filed to withdraw from the federal case citing reasons protected by attorney-client privilege. Ricco had once defended Osama bin Laden.

Buried Hearts review: Park Hyung-sik commands attention in his darkest roleReleased-Sat Feb 22, 2025The Korean drama Buried Hearts will captivate viewers with its blend of intense emotions and high-stakes drama. The series, featuring Park Hyung-sik, explores the complex dynamics of corporate intrigue and personal survival. Read the full review.

Rakhi Sawant reacts to summons: I'm poor, not criminal - focus on rape casesRakhi Sawant was summoned by the Maharashtra cyber cell to record her statement regarding YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's controversial remarks on Samay Raina's show, 'India's Got Latent'. She urged the police to focus on solving pending rape cases instead of treating her like a criminal.

Zero Day: Critics praise Robert De Niro, criticise show's 'incoherent politics'Critics have mixed reactions to Robert De Niro's latest Netflix series, Zero Day. While many have praised De Niro, a section of them are unhappy with the narrative of the show.

Grammy-nominated band OneRepublic unites with Karan Aujla for new song Tell MeGlobal pop-rock sensation OneRepublic is collaborating with Punjabi artist Karan Aujla for a new track titled Tell Me. It will release on February 27.

Mismatched actor Prajakta Koli to marry boyfriend on February 25: ReportActor Prajakta Koli is set to marry her boyfriend Vrishank Khanal on February 25. Their wedding festivities will begin on February 23.

Crime Beat review: Rahul Bhat, Saqib Saleem's crime drama gets lost in its own chaosReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025'Crime Beat', a political thriller, premiered on Zee5 on February 21. Based on the book titled 'The Price You Pay', the show falls short due to outdated tropes and exaggerated clichés.

Honey Singh says he's a great cook, reveals his favourite dishRapper and music producer Yo Yo Honey Singh opens up about his favourite cuisine, his cooking skills and more in an exclusive interaction with us.

From heartfelt to hilarious, in praise of Park Bo-young's versatilityKorean star Park Bo-young has been acting for almost two decades now. Her ability to completely inhabit the skin of her characters makes her truly stand out. She is currently seen in Melo Movie, which is streaming on Netflix.

Honey Singh on his Mumbai concert: Doing something I've never done beforeRapper Honey Singh is starting his countrywide tour from Mumbai on Saturday. In an exclusive interview with us, the singer talked about the gig and what he's doing differently this time at 'Millionaire India Tour at Stage Aajtak'.

Kangana Ranaut's Emergency to premiere on Netflix. Check release dateKangana Ranaut's film, Emergency, is going to hit the screens next month. The actor shared a quick announcement in her Instagram stories on Friday.

Robin Tunney marks 10 years since The Mentalist finale, thanks fan for their loveActor Robin Tunney celebrated the 10th anniversary of The Mentalist finale, expressing gratitude to fans for their unwavering support. She also reflected on the show's impact on her life and career.

Atif Aslam's surprise street performance in London leaves fans in disbelief. WatchSinger Atif Aslam's video of him performing on a London street has emerged online. This surprise clip has left many fans in disbelief.

Honey Singh Millionaire tour: Reasons why it's unlike any otherYo Yo Honey Singh is set to electrify Mumbai with his high-energy performance as part of the Stage Tak Millionaire tour, promising an unforgettable night of music and nostalgia. Here are a few reasons why one should not miss it.

Nobody Wants This 2: What is Leighton Meester playing in husband Adam Brody's show?Netflix renewed 'Nobody Wants This' for season 2 last year, and now actor Leighton Meester, known for playing Blair Waldorf in 'Gossip Girl', has joined the show. Her husband, actor Adam Brody, plays the lead character, Noah, in the series.

Comic Varun Grover's sharp take on Ranveer Allahbadia, censorship and BeerBicepsComedian-lyricist Varun Grover recently took a jibe at the recent controversy surrounding podcaster Ranveer Allahbadia's appearance on India's Got Latent.

BB 18's Alice Kaushik, Tajinder Bagga, others reunite at Arfeen-Sara's Goa bashBigg Boss 18 contestants, including Alice Kaushik, Tajinder Bagga, and Nyrraa Banerjii reunited to celebrate Sara and Arfeen Khan's anniversary in Goa.

Dhanashree Verma's cryptic post amid divorce rumours: From stressed to blessedDhanashree Verma recently shared a cryptic message on social media, suggesting a shift from 'stressed to blessed'. This comes amid swirling rumours of a possible divorce with cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal.

TV actor Dipika Kakar Ibrahim quits Celebrity MasterChef amid health concernsPopular TV actor Dipika Kakar Ibrahim has withdrawn from Celebrity MasterChef due to health issues. Despite the show's support, she prioritised her well-being over the competition.

Rapper-singer Honey Singh arrives in Mumbai for sold-out concertHoney Singh is in Mumbai for the much-anticipated Stage AajTak Millionaire concert this Saturday, February 22. With a fantastic set list, the sold-out show promises a night full of magic and madness.

Jisoo, Seo In-guk to star in Netflix's next show on virtual datingJisoo and Seo In-guk are joining hands for an upcoming Netflix drama, Boyfriend on Demand. The show will explore virtual reality dating.
The Last Of Us Part 2 release date announced The Last Of Us Part 2's release date has been announced. The Pedro Pascal show is all set to stream on Prime Video from April 13.

Is Eminem finally coming to India? Rapper's leaked schedule hints soLeaked documents have suggested that Eminem will perform in Mumbai in June 2025 as part of his world tour. The rapper's first visit to India is stirring excitement among fans.
Iconic TV show CID now streaming on NetflixCID on Netflix: The iconic Indian crime series CID is now available on Netflix, allowing fans worldwide to stream the popular show.

Will Prime Video's Jack Reacher ever visit India? Author Lee Child speaksAuthor Lee Child, whose Reacher books have inspired a series on Prime Video, spoke to India Today Digital, about the possibility of seeing his leading character travelling to India in the future.

Vlogger Shenaz Treasury reveals losing a brand deal after Ranveer Allahbadia row Former actor and influencer Shenaz Treasury recently shared how she lost a brand deal after Ranveer Allahbadia's controversy.

Nadaaniyan: Ibrahim Ali Khan explains love to Miss Briganza; release date outNetflix on Thursday announced the release date of Ibrahim Ali Khan and Khushi Kapoor's 'Nadaaniyan'. The film is a Gen-Z love story and is set in Delhi-Noida.

Palak Muchhal on timeless appeal of Sanam Teri Kasam title song: It's magicalSanam Teri Kasam's title track is topping the music charts. Singer Palak Muchhal calls it surreal, recalls recording it, and hints at a new version. She also discusses Amitabh Bachchan's praise and the evolving music industry.

They'll just ask Samay Raina to write a 300-word essay: Comic mocks outrageComedian Daniel Fernandes mocked the outrage over Samay Raina's controversy, joking that he'd only need to write a "300-word essay." He also criticised calls to ban India's Got Latent.

Rihanna, A$AP Rocky to name next baby after lawyer who helped win caseIn a statement, A$AP Rocky's lawyer revealed that the rapper and his long-time partner Rihanna jokingly promised to name their next child after him. A$AP Rocky was found not guilty in a felony assault trial.

Aashram 3 part 2 trailer: Bobby Deol is back as the menacing Baba NiralaAshram Season 3, Part 2 trailer: The much-awaited Aashram returns with Part 2 of Season 3, directed by Prakash Jha. The new season delves into themes of power, betrayal, and revenge.

Melo Movie review: A slow-burn, mature drama that will stay with youReleased-Fri Feb 14, 2025Melo Movie released in Netflix on February 14. Starring Choi Woo-shik and Park Bo-young, the 10-episode-show deals with love, loss, and grief.

New Matthew Perry documentary promises to dig deep into the Hollywood tragedyA new Matthew Perry documentary called Matthew Perry: A Hollywood Tragedy will be out later this month, wherein the makers will investigate the untimely death of the Friends star.

The First Frost review: Love, trauma, longing - new Chinese drama delivers it all Released-Thu Feb 20, 2025The First Frost review: This Chinese drama delves into the complexities of love, trauma, and longing, offering a poignant narrative that diverges from typical romance tropes. With its melancholic visuals and dual perspectives, it explores the tangled history between its protagonists, making it a compelling watch.

Uorfi Javed's mother on her bold fashion: Was shocked at first, but I support herUorfi Javed revealed her mother was the first in their family to try Botox. Her mother also recalled her reaction when she saw Uorfi's "new style".

Suzhal 2 trailer: Kathir takes on gripping murder mystery with Aishwarya RajeshThe official trailer of the highly-anticipated second season of the Tamil crime thriller Suzhal - The Vortex was released on Wednesday. Starring Kathir and Aishwarya Rajesh in lead roles, the series will premiere on Prime Video on February 28.

Rihanna 'thankful, humbled' after A$AP Rocky found not guilty in shooting caseA$AP Rocky was declared not guilty in a felony assault trial, leading to an emotional embrace with Rihanna in court. After the verdict, the singer issued her first statement, expressing relief.

general news.headline: IND vs PAK preview: India firm favourites as Dubai miracle only hope for PakistanChampions Trophy 2025 preview: India enter the high-voltage clash against Pakistan as overwhelming favourites. Pakistan, struggling with injuries and inconsistency, will need nothing less than a miracle in Dubai to pull off an upset.

Trump ramps up attack over USAID handouts to India: Taking advantage of usUS President Donald Trump ramped up his attack on the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) funds to India, claiming that it gave "18 million dollars" to India to assist with its election.

India vs Pakistan: A cricket war that's now just a big yawnChampions Trophy 2025: The template of India-Pakistan cricket has become predictable. India gets beaten only when it has a rare off day. But, Pakistan loses even when it has a great day. Meaning? In closely fought games, India always wins.

Elon Musk jabs Parag Agrawal amid 'report or resign' order: Did nothing, got firedAn X user shared a piece of a conversation between Elon Musk and former Twitter CEO Parag Agrawal, in which the former sought a report of work done in a week before firing him in 2022.

Telangana tunnel collapse: 8 trapped behind 200 metres of debris, Army called inThe accident occurred due to the slippage of a concrete segment that was used to seal seepage at the 14-km inlet of the Srisailam Left Bank Canal tunnel, which runs from Srisailam towards Devarakonda.

Freed Israeli hostage who kissed Hamas men was 'told to do so by terrorists'Shem's release came well over a year after coordinated Hamas-led terrorist attacks on southern Israel on October 7, 2023, in which some 1,200 people were killed and around 250 were abducted and held in Gaza.

Facts will come out: S Jaishankar on USAID's 'bad faith' activities in IndiaSpeaking at the Delhi University Literature Festival, Jaishankar addressed concerns raised after US President Donald Trump claimed that USAID allocated $21 million to boost voter turnout in India.

Tejashwi Yadav says JD(U) could be 'saved' if Nitish Kumar's son enters politicsTejashwi Yadav said he would welcome Bihar CM Nitish Kumar's son, Nishant Kumar, joining politics, suggesting it could save JD(U) from its alliance partners. He criticised Nitish's alliance with the BJP and questioned speculation about early elections in Bihar.

Kohli vs Babar: A tale of 2 'kings' looking to break out of form slumpVirat Kohli and Babar Azam are considered to be two of the greatest batters of the current generation, but are going through one of the worst slumps in form in their careers. What do the star batters need to break out of the poor run they're going through at the moment?

LPU's 2025 Batch Final Year Student Bags Rs 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) Placement Package-Betireddy Naga Vamsi Reddy B. Tech student has secured a 1.03 Crore ($1,18,000) package with an AI robotics company and is set to graduate in May 2025. 

-Over 1,700 students have received packages ranging from Rs 10 LPA – Rs 1 Crore per annum 

-1,912 students received multiple job offers while Adireddy Vasu, secured 7 job offers, setting a rare and impressive record.

Israel delays release of 620 Palestinians over 'humiliating' hostage handoverPrime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's office released a statement in the early hours of Sunday saying that Israel was waiting to deliver the 620 Palestinian prisoners and detainees "until the release of the next hostages has been assured, and without the humiliating ceremonies."

Elon Musk says US government workers must document work done or lose jobsElon Musk threatened to fire US federal employees who fail to report their weekly work. Agencies received emails demanding responses. Legal challenges and union opposition have emerged against the move.

Ashley St Clair sues Elon Musk, seeks sole custody of 5-month-old son: ReportAshley St Clair has filed a paternity suit against Elon Musk, seeking sole custody of their five-month-old son. She claims Musk has rarely seen the child and requests a genetic test. Musk has not publicly addressed the case.

Why PM appointed ex-RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das as Principal SecretaryThe Centre has appointed former RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das as Principal Secretary to Prime Minister Narendra Modi. Das, a key figure in economic policy, previously served as Economic Affairs Secretary and represented India at global financial forums.

Maharashtra halts bus services to Karnataka after attack by pro-Kannada activistsMaharashtra State Road Transport Corporation (MSRTC) bus, which was plying from Bengaluru to Mumbai, was attacked in Chitradurga in Karnataka on Friday night by pro-Kannada activists.

Trump says will impose reciprocal tariffs on India 'soon' days after meeting PMDays after meeting Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Washington DC, US President Donald Trump said he will "soon" impose reciprocal tariffs on countries such as India and China.

X user asks Anand Mahindra to gift Thar to FBI director Kash Patel. See his responseIn a post on X, Anand Mahindra shared a picture of Kash Patel with the caption: "Kash Patel, new Director of the FBI. Doesn't look like you can mess with this guy. Mind it."
Question Time: Weekly News QuizThink you read the headlines this week? Let's test that!

Bail to rape accused as court says girl, 14, 'knew full import of her actions'The Bombay High Court granted bail to a man jailed for over five years under the POCSO Act. It noted the minor girl voluntarily stayed with him. The court cited inconsistencies in evidence and the accused's lack of a criminal record.

Odisha vows safe campus as Nepal government seeks removal of 'unruly' KIIT staffThe Nepal government has urged Odisha to permanently remove KIIT staff accused of mistreating Nepalese students following a student's death. Odisha's Chief Minister assured safety measures, while protests and calls for accountability continue amid ongoing investigations.

Filming war right: What Chhaava could have learnt from Jodhaa Akbar, Bajirao MastaniChhaava, led by Vicky Kaushal, delivers relentless, violent war sequences that lack emotional depth, making battles exhausting rather than engaging. Unlike Bajirao Mastani and Jodhaa Akbar, which balanced spectacle with storytelling, Chhaava overwhelms with its brutal scenes.

Pope Francis not out of danger, very little to become unbalanced: DoctorPope Francis, 88, remains in critical condition after a severe respiratory crisis, requiring oxygen and blood transfusions. Doctors warn of sepsis risk. He remains alert but in pain. Vatican events continue without him as his recovery remains uncertain.

Punjab in fire-fighting mode over 'non-existent' department: Was restructuredThe AAP-led Punjab government faced criticism after clarifying that the Department of Administrative Reforms, assigned to Minister Kuldeep Singh Dhaliwal, "never actually existed". Opposition leaders called it a major governance failure.

1 dead in France knife attack, Emmanuel Macron calls it 'Islamist terrorism'One person was killed and three others, including two police officers, were wounded in a knife attack during a demonstration in eastern France. President Macron called it an Islamist terror act. The suspect, 37, was on a terror watchlist.

Watch: Honey Singh's take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi Aa Gaya Oye'Honey Singh launched his Millionaire India Tour in Mumbai, delivering a captivating performance that engaged a sold-out audience. He shared his take on Diljit Dosanjh's 'Punjabi aa gays oye', emphasising unity among diverse Indian communities.

Andrew Garfield dating A Complete Unknown actor Monica Barbaro: ReportAndrew Garfield is reportedly dating Monica Barbaro of Top Gun Maverick fame. The couple was seen attending a play in London's West End, sparking rumors of them dating.

Kunal Kemmu on Saif Ali Khan's stabbing: I broke this news to SohaActor Kunal Kemmu opened up about the shocking incident involving Saif Ali Khan's stabbing. He shared his family's initial reactions and thoughts on celebrities safety.

Yash aka Ravana in Nitesh Tiwari's Ramayana begins shoot in Mumbai: ReportActor Yash has commenced filming for Ramayana in Mumbai, taking on the role of Ravana in the film, as per reports. The current schedule focusses on a grand war sequence, but Ramnbir Kapoor will not be joining him.

sports.headline: Hero to villain? Dubai set to play defining role in Babar Azam's career once againIndia meet Pakistan at the Dubai International Stadium on Sunday, February 23. Dubai once saw Babar Azam rise to stardom in 2021, it may end up unravelling his career in 2025.

Champions Trophy: Five Talking Points shaping up India vs Pakistan blockbuster clashIndia and Pakistan are all set to lock horns in the fifth Match of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 in Dubai. While both teams are coming into the fixture in contrasting forms, the match has all the ingredients to be a thriller with various factors affecting its outcome.

IND vs PAK Live: Upbeat India look to deliver knockout punch to PakistanChampions Trophy 2025 India (IND) vs Pakistan (PAK) Live Score and Updates: India head into the marquee contest in Dubai as overwhelming favourites. Pakistan, who are in danger of an early exit, need to punch above their weight on Sunday to stand a chance against a well-oiled Indian side, led by Rohit Sharma.

Pakistan Cricket chief hopeful of win vs India: We are fully preparedPCB Chief Mohsin Naqvi backed Pakistan to bounce back against India in their crucial Champions Trophy clash, emphasizing the team's ability to stage a comeback despite their opening loss to New Zealand.

Kohli vs Babar: A tale of 2 'kings' looking to break out of form slumpVirat Kohli and Babar Azam are considered to be two of the greatest batters of the current generation, but are going through one of the worst slumps in form in their careers. What do the star batters need to break out of the poor run they're going through at the moment?

Pakistan, struggling with injuries and inconsistency, will need nothing less than a miracle in Dubai to pull off an upset.

17-year-old Mirra Andreeva becomes youngest-ever WTA 1000 champion Mirra Andreeva beat Clara Tauson 7-6 (1), 6-1 in the final of the Dubai Tennis Championships on Saturday, February 22, to become the youngest-ever WTA 1000 champion at the age of 17.

WPL 2025: Chinelle Henry, bowlers help UP Warriorz thrash Delhi Capitals by 33 runsUP Warriorz registered their first win of the Women's Premier League 2025 beating Delhi Capitals by 33 runs in Match 8 in Bengaluru. Chinelle Henry was adjudged Player of the Match for her game-changing innings of 62 (23).

Who said what after Josh Inglis helped Australia secure record win vs EnglandJosh Inglis was the star of the show as he helped Australia script a historic win in the Champions Trophy on Staurday, February 22. Inglis' 120 ultimately eclipsed a sensational performance from Ben Duckett with the bat for England.

No extra advantage for India in Dubai, we need to play with courage: Aqib JavedPakistan bowling coach Aqib Javed said that India won't be having any extra advantage playing in Dubai and mentioned that his team will play with courage in the all-important clash between the two teams on Sunday, February 23.

Josh Inglis hundred trumps Duckett's 165 in Australia's historic run-chase Champions Trophy: Josh Inglis' 77-ball hundred helped Australia chase down 352 and beat Jos Buttler's England by five wickets on Saturday in front of a sold-out crowd at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore.

Chinelle Henry was adjudged Player of the Match for her game-changing innings of 62 (23).

Inglis' 120 ultimately eclipsed a sensational performance from Ben Duckett with the bat for England.

Josh Inglis hundred trumps Duckett's 165 in Australia's historic run-chase Champions Trophy: Josh Inglis' 77-ball hundred helped Australia chase down 352 and beat Jos Buttler's England by five wickets on Saturday in front of a sold-out crowd at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore.

Aqib not worried about India's spin threat: Will play according to our strengthPakistan bowling coach Aqib Javed said that their team isn't too worried about India's spin-bowling threat ahead of the all-important clash between the two teams in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025.

How Rawalpindi weather forecast adds more pressure to Pakistan before India gameThe weather forecast for Rawalpindi on February 27 is all set to add more pressure to Pakistan ahead of their crucial game against India on Sunday. Pakistan will be facing Bangladesh on February 27 in Rawalpindi.

Chinelle Henry hits joint-fastest WPL fifty to demolish DCWPL 2025: UP Warriorz' batter Chinelle Henry equalled Sophia Dunkley's record for the fastest fifty in the history of the tournament during the match against Delhi Capitals on February 22 in Bengaluru.

Yuzvendra Chahal, Dhanashree file for divorce, dancer's family deny alimony rumoursIndia cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal and his wife Dhanashree Verma have filed for divorce after months of speculation around their separation. Dhanashree's family has also denied reports of her asking for alimony.

India vs Pakistan in Dubai: Our favourite memories from historic rivalry Champions Trophy 2025: Before the marquee clash on Sunday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium, our team members at India Today picked their best memories from matches between India and Pakistan.

Harbhajan Singh explains 'only way' Pakistan can 'upset' IndiaChampions Trophy 2025: Harbhajan Singh, in an interview with India Today, said that Pakistan need to take early wickets in the first five overs to give themselves any chance of beating India in the marquee clash on Sunday in Dubai.

India vs Pakistan, Champions Trophy: When and where to watch? Champions Trophy Live Streaming: Rohit Sharma's India and Mohammad Rizwan's Pakistan will lock horns in Match No.5 of the ongoing tournament on Sunday, February 23 at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

Virat Kohli will get hundred vs Pakistan, will do bhangra if he does: HarbhajanHarbhajan Singh has made the bold prediction that Virat Kohli will score a hundred against Pakistan during their Champions Trophy clash on Sunday, February 23. Kohli hasn't been in the best of form heading into the contest.

Harbhajan Singh explains 'only way' Pakistan can 'upset' IndiaChampions Trophy 2025: Harbhajan Singh, in an interview with India Today, said that Pakistan need to take early wickets in the first five overs to give themselves any chance of beating India in the marquee clash on Sunday in Dubai.

Kohli hasn't been in the best of form heading into the contest.

India vs Pakistan, all you need to know: Predicted playing XI, Pitch reportIndia and Pakistan are all set to clash in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 on Sunday, February 23 in Dubai. Here's a look at how both teams can change their playing XI for the fixture and also the nature of the pitch for the epic game.

First sell-out crowd of Champions Trophy, features a Virat Kohli fanChampions Trophy 2025: A fan, wearing Virat Kohli's jersey no.18, attended Saturday's match between England and Australia at the Gaddafi Stadium in Lahore. Kohli will play in the match against Pakistan on Sunday.

Not going to take Pakistan as a lesser team, we'll bring our A-game: Shubman GillIndia vice-captain Shubman Gill said that they're not going to take Pakistan lightly during the highly anticipated clash between the two teams in the Champions Trophy 2025. India are coming into the game having won their first fixture against Bangladesh while Pakistan lost their opening game against New Zealand and are in a do-or-die situation.

Babar Azam plays for himself, focusses on stats under pressure: Ex-Pakistan spinnerFormer Pakistan spinner Danish Kaneria has claimed that Babar Azam plays for himself and focusses on stats when he is playing under pressure. Babar was heavily criticised for his slow batting in the first match against New Zealand.

AUS vs ENG: Ben Duckett creates Champions Trophy history with 143-ball 165Ben Duckett created Champions Trophy 2025 history with his incredible 165 off 143 balls against Australia in Lahore. Duckett became the first batter to score 150 in the history of the competition.

Sourav Ganguly names his four semi-finalists for Champions Trophy 2025Former India captain Sourav Ganguly shared his four potential semi-finalists for the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. Ganguly also backed Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli to perform at their best against Pakistan.

Is the India vs Pakistan hype real? Mood in the campIndia play Pakistan in their group stage match of the Champions Trophy on Sunday, February 23. While the rivalry used to be fierce earlier, it has gone down a notch with India dominating majority of the ICC competitions in the recent past. We here at India Today ask our colleagues one simple question before the match. Is the hype real?

Who are we to call India vs Pakistan overhyped when millions love it: Shubman GillIndia vice-captain Shubman Gill brushed aside any concerns about the hype around the India vs Pakistan rivalry dying saying that the fans continue to enjoy the epic clash.

Shubman Gill: Vice-captain only when fielding, just a batter when battingShubman Gill has said that he doesn't carry his vice-captaincy role while batting as he wants to think like a batter at that moment. Gill said he takes on the vice-captaincy role seriously while India is fielding.

Rishabh Pant down with viral fever, misses training before Pakistan clash Champions Trophy: Shubman Gill said that Rishabh Pant was down with viral fever and didn't take part in the training session before India's marquee clash on Sunday at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.

Gopichand stands by 'don't let your child pursue sport' remark, explains reasonLegendary badminton player turned coach Pullela Gopichand has stood by his controversial remark. Gopichand made headlines on February 19 when he said that he does not advise families to allow their children to pursue sports unless they are rich.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.
